item.title: Readability tests
item.description: Flesch–Kincaid readability tests. Are readability tests designed to indicate how difficult a reading passage in English is to understand. There are two tests, the Flesch Reading Ease, and the Flesch–Kincaid Grade Level. [WIKI] Due to own usage reasons I have decided to implement these readability tests in favourite language. Algorithm is quite simple I will focus on Flesch Reading ease. Flesch Reading Ease test Score Notes 90.
